feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.18
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds a button to fetch logs when skipping happens  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3920 (f6f1b)
  • Adds support for settings page and adds links to github  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3922 (4c2b4)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes logfmt in details  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3912 (2aad1)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency vue-i18n to ^11.1.4  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3914 (defab)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3919 (cfe72)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3921 (aeada)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.20
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds a option to collapse all in side menu  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3930 (31174)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Improve Dutch translation for help support message in nl.yml  -  by @homelab-alpha in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3938 (186b4)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3936 (51584)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.21
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Adjusted <meter> thresholds for CPU and Memory usage display  -  by @homelab-alpha in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3940 (7e2dd)
  • Fixes really big logs being split in Docker that exceeded 16KB  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3946 (252d8)
  • Enhance accuracy of CPU usage metrics in the UI  -  by @homelab-alpha in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3944 (1c20a)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3949 (02c28)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.13.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds icon to log out link  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3960 (064d5)
  • Makes shadow on dark mode light  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3961 (e01ba)
  • Adds the ability to show a specific log from the past with a permanent link  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3958 (d9800)
  • Changes log actions to hover just a little and take up less space  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3972 (8dde2)
  • i18n: Add Korean translation  -  by @HwangJungeon in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3956 (d4dab)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Adds scoll to menu  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3966 (3c2a2)
  • Fixes incorrect escaping of array strings. fixes #3962  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3973 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3962 (2d396)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3952 (098f0)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3957 (373f9)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3959 (f22c5)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3968 (931c8)
    View changes on GitHub
